sections.heading: residential real property appraiser, defined
sections.text: Licensed residential real property appraiser means a person who holds a valid credential as a licensed residential real property appraiser issued under the Real Property Appraiser Act.SourceLaws 1990, LB 1153, § 13;Laws 1991, LB 203, § 16;Laws 2006, LB 77

76-2213.Licensed residential real property appraiser, defined.

Licensed residential real property appraiser means a person who holds a valid credential as a licensed residential real property appraiser issued under the Real Property Appraiser Act.

SourceLaws 1990, LB 1153, § 13;Laws 1991, LB 203, § 16;Laws 2006, LB 778, § 30;Laws 2007, LB186, § 4;Laws 2010, LB931, § 3;Laws 2015, LB139, § 26.
